Tell HN: Azure services down in West Europe region
text:
We have been facing SQL connectivity issues for more than an hour now. The SQL server in West Europe region is down.

The app services in this region are also not accessible via the Azure portal.

Azure status is still green. https://status.azure.com/en-us/status
